name: The Inn at the End of the World
name_original: The Inn at the End of the World
description:
The world ended thirty years ago, but you carry on. The people of the wasteland need your hospitality. Learn their tastes, satisfy their needs, and build your inn’s reputation, and you may just change their lives.

A project produced in the spring of 2021 by 8 students at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute. 

Credits:

Sean Dunigan - Back End Developer

Sun Jeong - Front End Developer

Jimmy Jin - Sound Effects/Music

Bryan Miao - Character/Narrative Writer

Annabel Prodnuk - Environment/Concept Artist

Lucy Smithers - Writer/Game Designer

Miles Tyson - Character Artist

Sean Walsh - Character Animator
